ComicInfo.Title: The Convent of The Sisters of Blood
ComicInfo.Summary:
It's 1232 and Heinrich Barbarossa (known as Thurim on Resurrection) and his crusading knights defeat the Saracen army on The Mountain of God in the Holy Land, leaving him free to seize the Thurim Hammer - with just a small matter of sacrificing his loyal knights in the process, the treacherous infidel!
On Resurrection, at the Field of the Cloth of Crimson, Dracula concludes some Black Opium business with the Dystopians, and Lady Claudia Demona shows off her animal obedience training in a 'friendly' tournament. Down, boy! Down!
...While Requiem, bent on rescuing Rebecca from the Convent of Blood, faces seriously heavy nun action - has he finally met his match against the monstrous Mother Superior?
Requiem 7 continues to wow with stunning painted art, featuring a Hieronymus Bosch-esque vertical spread of Thurim's personal hell, and includes a gallery collection of unlettered artwork from all the volumes released digitally so far.
